attributes.action: Speeding on West Hill, East Grinstead
attributes.additional_details:
To enforce 30 MPH speed limit on West Hill.

West Hill is used as a main road into East Grinstead town. The road is unclassified with residential properties along its length and hidden driveways between parked cars.

Proposal - Traffic calming, reduce carriageway width, improved signage.

Police Community Officer has previously advised it is "too dangerous for Traffic Police to enforce limit due to the speed cars are traveling".
